title: Permai Vegetarian Food Center
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Western, Asian, Malaysian
description: Vegetarian restaurant tucked away in Permai village. Not everything is vegan. Has both Malay, Chinese, and Western food like veggie burger and pasta dishes. Most Asian dishes are vegan, you can always ask. Lots of good juice and drink options. Daily specials of local food available. With air-conditioning.
